class es_sfgtools.processing.functions.gnss_functions.PridePPP(*, modified_julian_date: Annotated[float, Ge(ge=0)], second_of_day: Annotated[float, Ge(ge=0), Le(le=86400)], x: Annotated[float, Ge(ge=-6378100), Le(le=6378100)], y: Annotated[float, Ge(ge=-6378100), Le(le=6378100)], z: Annotated[float, Ge(ge=-6378100), Le(le=6378100)], latitude: Annotated[float, Ge(ge=-90), Le(le=90)], longitude: Annotated[float, Ge(ge=0), Le(le=360)], height: Annotated[float, Ge(ge=-101), Le(le=100)], number_of_satellites: Annotated[int, Ge(ge=0), Le(le=125)] = 1, pdop: Annotated[float, Ge(ge=0), Le(le=100)] = 0, time: datetime | None = None)

Bases: BaseModel

Data class for PPP GNSS kinematic position output Docs: https://github.com/PrideLab/PRIDE-PPPAR

model_fields: ClassVar[dict[str, FieldInfo]] = {'height': FieldInfo(annotation=float, required=True, metadata=[Ge(ge=-101), Le(le=100)]), 'latitude': FieldInfo(annotation=float, required=True, metadata=[Ge(ge=-90), Le(le=90)]), 'longitude': FieldInfo(annotation=float, required=True, metadata=[Ge(ge=0), Le(le=360)]), 'modified_julian_date': FieldInfo(annotation=float, required=True, metadata=[Ge(ge=0)]), 'number_of_satellites': FieldInfo(annotation=int, required=False, default=1, metadata=[Ge(ge=0), Le(le=125)]), 'pdop': FieldInfo(annotation=float, required=False, default=0, metadata=[Ge(ge=0), Le(le=100)]), 'second_of_day': FieldInfo(annotation=float, required=True, metadata=[Ge(ge=0), Le(le=86400)]), 'time': FieldInfo(annotation=Union[datetime, NoneType], required=False, default=None), 'x': FieldInfo(annotation=float, required=True, metadata=[Ge(ge=-6378100), Le(le=6378100)]), 'y': FieldInfo(annotation=float, required=True, metadata=[Ge(ge=-6378100), Le(le=6378100)]), 'z': FieldInfo(annotation=float, required=True, metadata=[Ge(ge=-6378100), Le(le=6378100)])}

Metadata about the fields defined on the model, mapping of field names to [FieldInfo][pydantic.fields.FieldInfo].

This replaces Model.__fields__ from Pydantic V1.
